description: amp;#945;-amylase/protease inhibitors, globulins, and farinins.  Assessment of reactivity towards purified recombinant proteins further confirmed the presence of antibody response to specific antigens.  The results demonstrate that, in addition to the well-recognized immune reaction to gluten, celiac disease is associated with a robust humoral response directed at a specific subset of the non-gluten proteins of wheat

terms.name: taxonomy: scientific name
terms.value: Specific Non-Gluten Proteins of Wheat are Novel Target Antigens in Celiac Disease Humoral Response

title: Specific Non-Gluten Proteins of Wheat are Novel Target Antigens in Celiac Disease Humoral Response
